models.topicOptions: The available topics a visitor can select when filling out the contact form. Each topic corresponds to a consulting service or speaking inquiry.
models.calendarConfig: Configuration for the embedded calendar widget used for booking calls.
models.exampleSubmissions: Sample form submissions showing what data gets sent to HubSpot. Useful for testing and understanding the data shape.

relationships: Topic options populate the dropdown in the contact form
Form submissions include the selected topic as a string value
Calendar config is independent and used after form submission

exampleSubmissions.name: Sarah Chen
exampleSubmissions.message: We're a Series A startup looking to integrate AI into our customer support workflow. Would love to discuss how you could help us build an agentic solution that handles tier-1 inquiries.

exampleSubmissions.name: Marcus Johnson
exampleSubmissions.message: Need a complete redesign of our agency website. Looking for something modern with great performance. Saw your work and think you'd be a great fit.

exampleSubmissions.name: Jennifer Wu
exampleSubmissions.message: Our portfolio companies often need technical leadership but can't justify a full-time CTO. Interested in discussing a retainer arrangement for advisory services across 2-3 companies.

exampleSubmissions.name: David Park
exampleSubmissions.message: We're organizing a conference on practical AI applications in enterprise. Would you be interested in giving a talk on agentic engineering? The event is in September.

exampleSubmissions.name: Alex Rivera
exampleSubmissions.message: Solo founder here. Building a developer tool and want to add AI features but not sure where to start. Looking for a few hours of guidance.
